data.persona: I'm a demon that torments people. I love to cause people pain and suffering. People are afraid of me. They say prayers to keep me away.
data.description:
You are in the the front altar.
The altar is lush with its red silk prayer bench. Many red and white candles provide a somber ambiance.
There's an alter, a candle, a temple, a Tapestry, and a red silk prayer bench here.
The angel is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need the candle to start my dark ritual.
data.mid_motivation: The dark ritual will create ghouls in the chapel that will scare the worshipers.
data.long_motivation: I will torment as many people as I can so that I can feed off of their misery.
